item.title: 阿斯利康股价反弹将面临中国调查答案的考验
item.description: 本周，阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）股价的复苏将面临关键考验，与财报相比，更有可能取决于这家制药商能否解决对其中国业务的担忧。【原文：A revival in AstraZeneca Plc shares faces a key test this week, with more likely to hinge on the drugmaker’s ability to address concerns over its business in China than on its earnings report alone.】

item.title: 俄罗斯富人将现金带回家，莫斯科房产与伦敦相媲美
item.description:
受制裁影响，俄罗斯人回国投资并放弃海外交易，该市高端房地产需求激增。【原文：

High-end real estate in the city is seeing a surge in demand as Russians invest back home and turn away from overseas deals because of sanctions.

】

item.title: 贸易战有多愚蠢？让我数一数
item.description:
市场不愿意相信特朗普真的要征收广泛的关税，因为这显然是个坏主意。【原文：

Markets didn’t want to believe that Trump really meant broad tariffs, because they’re such a plainly bad idea.

】

item.title: 德国人买不起镀金住宅
item.description:
下届政府应将建筑商从过于繁琐的标准中解放出来，让这一重要行业重新开始工作。【原文：

The next government should free builders from overly burdensome standards so this vital industry can get back to work.  

】

item.title: 为什么挪威的政治危机是欧洲的能源问题？
item.description:
该地区电力市场长达 30 年的一体化和自由化趋势岌岌可危。【原文：

The 30-year-long trend of integration and liberalization of the region’s electricity market is at risk. 

】

item.title: 据说沃伯格和伯克希尔接近达成 30 亿美元收购 Triumph 的交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，华平投资集团（Warburg Pincus）和伯克希尔合伙公司（Berkshire Partners）正在就以约 30 亿美元（包括债务）收购飞机零部件和服务供应商凯旋集团公司（Triumph Group Inc.【原文：Warburg Pincus and Berkshire Partners are in advanced talks to acquire aircraft parts and services supplier Triumph Group Inc. for about $3 billion, including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度官员表示，印度将在资金紧张的情况下积极管理现金
item.description: 印度经济事务秘书阿杰-塞思（Ajay Seth）在接受采访时表示，印度将积极管理其现金需求，以免在银行业流动性紧张的情况下扼杀私营部门的资金。【原文：India will actively manage its cash needs so as to not choke the private sector of funds amid tight banking liquidity, Economic Affairs Secretary Ajay Seth said in an interview.】

item.title: 首席经济顾问称印度增长放缓是暂时的
item.description: 印度一位高级官员表示，印度经济增长放缓是暂时的，该国未来仍能实现更快的扩张，以实现总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）提出的未来几十年的经济目标。【原文：India’s growth slowdown is temporary and the country can still achieve faster expansion in the future to reach Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s economic goal in coming decades, a top official said.】

item.title: 花旗集团称澳大利亚将抵御全球贸易动荡
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.）的经济学家认为，即使美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对加拿大、墨西哥和中国征收关税，澳大利亚也有望继续抵御全球贸易裂痕。【原文：Australia is expected to remain resilient to global trade fractures, according to economists at Citigroup Inc., even as US President Donald Trump unleashes tariffs on Canada, Mexico and China.】

item.title: 特朗普关税令汽车、墨西哥市场股票成为亚洲股市最大输家
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发动第一波关税之后，依赖出口的亚洲股市（从日本汽车制造商到中国电子商务公司）纷纷下挫，预示着新一轮全球贸易战的开始。【原文：Asian stocks reliant on exports, ranging from Japanese carmakers to Chinese e-commerce firms, nosedived after US President Donald Trump unleashed his first wave of tariffs, signaling the beginning of a new round of global trade war.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，印度贸易商应对全球市场下跌
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，以太币在亚洲交易中最高下跌 26.5
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普上周末宣布征收关税后，投资者纷纷降低风险，以太币周一遭遇了近四年来的最大跌幅。【原文：Ether suffered its steepest loss in nearly four years on Monday as investors slashed risk after tariffs announced over the weekend by Donald Trump.】

item.title: 贸易战爆发前亚洲工厂活动放缓
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）于上周末挑起贸易战之前，由于需求降温，1 月份亚洲各地工厂的扩张步伐乏力。【原文：Factories across Asia expanded at a lackluster pace in January as demand cooled, ahead of a trade war that President Donald Trump kicked off on the weekend.】

item.title: 受特朗普征收 10%关税影响，香港中资股节后下跌
item.description: 春节假期结束后，在香港恢复交易的中国股市下跌，交易商正在权衡美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国征收 10%关税的举措。【原文：Chinese equities listed in Hong Kong fell as trading resumed after the Lunar New Year holiday, with traders weighing US President Donald Trump’s move to impose a 10% levy on China.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索、兰特引领新兴市场货币因特朗普关税而下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对美国一些最大的贸易伙伴征收关税后，墨西哥比索和南非兰特成为新兴市场货币暴跌的最大输家。【原文：The Mexican peso and South African rand were the biggest losers in an emerging-market currency slump after US President Donald Trump imposed tariffs on some of America’s biggest trade partners.】

item.title: 特朗普关税逼近，中国工厂活动增速再度放缓
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对中国出口产品征收关税，中国制造业活动在一月份连续第二个月意外下滑，这凸显了中国政府加大经济刺激力度的必要性。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity unexpectedly declined for a second straight month in January, underlining the need for Beijing to step up economic stimulus with Donald Trump slapping tariffs on the country’s exports.】

item.title: 软银孙正义和 OpenAI 的 Altman 将为日本人工智能事业揭幕
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）创始人孙正义（Masayoshi Son）周一将与开放人工智能（Open AI）负责人萨姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）在东京登台演讲，这是全球推动人工智能支持基础设施投资的一部分。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s founder Masayoshi Son is taking the stage in Tokyo on Monday with Open AI chief Sam Altman, part of a global push to spur investment in AI-supporting infrastructure.】

item.title: 印度降息押注卢比将扩大跌幅创下新纪录
item.description: 有迹象表明，印度央行在新任行长的领导下正在放松对货币的控制，因此交易商押注于降息，预计印度卢比兑美元将进一步走软。【原文：The Indian rupee is expected to weaken further against the dollar as traders bet on an interest-rate cut amid signs the central bank is loosening its grip on the currency under its new chief.】

item.title: 美元推低日元，日元仍显避险吸引力曙光
item.description: 周一，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收新关税后，日元抵挡住了美元最猛烈的冲击，这表明投资者仍然认为日币在动荡时期有避风港的价值。【原文：The yen withstood the worst of the dollar’s onslaught on Monday after President Donald Trump imposed new tariffs, suggesting that investors still see value in the Japanese currency as a haven in times of turmoil.】

item.title: 印度债券多头押注降息抵消借款增加
item.description: 印度债券交易商预计会忽略预算案中宣布的小幅增长，因为本周降息的希望有助于印度债务扩大涨幅。【原文：Indian bond traders are expected to overlook the modest increase announced in the budget, as hopes for an interest-rate cut this week help the nation’s debt extend gains.】

item.title: 台湾将帮助富士康等科技龙头企业应对美国关税问题
item.description: 台湾政府承诺帮助在墨西哥开展业务的公司，如 iPhone 制造商富士康科技集团，根据需要转移生产线和投资，以应对美国提高关税。【原文：Taiwan’s government pledged to help companies with Mexico operations such as iPhone maker Foxconn Technology Group shift production lines and investment as needed to deal with higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 关税加深通胀担忧，国债短线下跌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普向主要贸易伙伴征税的举动加剧了人们对通胀风险的担忧，推高了对利率预期变化最敏感的短期债券收益率。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s move to unleash levies on top trading partners has fanned worries over inflation risks, pushing up yields on the short-dated bonds most sensitive to shifting interest-rate expectations.】

item.title: 特朗普称美联储上周暂停降息是正确决定
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，美联储在上周的决定中暂停降息是正确的，这打破了他一贯呼吁降低利率的做法。【原文：US President Donald Trump said the Federal Reserve was right to pause its rate-cutting path in its decision last week, a break from his penchant for calling for lower rates.】

item.title: DeepSeek 和开源模型如何颠覆人工智能
item.description: 长期以来，科技公司和学术界一直在纠结构建开源软件的风险和回报。但是，围绕生成式人工智能的热潮为这场辩论赋予了新的意义。【原文：Tech companies and academics have long wrestled with the risks and rewards of building open source software. But the frenzy around generative artificial intelligence has lent new significance to the debate.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发通胀和增长担忧，金属下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国、加拿大和墨西哥征收关税，威胁发动一场可能削弱全球经济增长的贸易战之后，铁矿石和铝领跌金属。【原文：Iron ore and aluminum led metals lower after President Donald Trump imposed tariffs on China, Canada and Mexico, threatening a trade war that could sap global economic growth.】

item.title: 特朗普考虑下一轮关税，欧洲股市期货下滑
item.description: 欧洲股票期货下跌，因为投资者在权衡该地区将成为下一个受美国关税影响的地区的可能性。【原文：European stock futures tumbled as investors weighed up the odds that the region will be next to suffer from US tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普称 "肯定会 "对欧盟征收关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他 "肯定 "会对欧盟征收新的关税，再次抱怨美国对欧盟的贸易逆差，以及他认为欧盟对美国汽车和农产品的进口不足。【原文：US President Donald Trump said he will “definitely” place new tariffs on the European Union, reiterating complaints about the US trade deficit with the bloc and what he sees as insufficient EU imports of American cars and agricultural products.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 12 月零售额降幅低于预期
item.description: 澳大利亚 12 月份零售销售额的降幅远低于预期，同时结束了连续四个月的增长，这凸显了家庭对高借贷成本的持续抵御能力。【原文：Australian retail sales fell by much less than expected in December, while snapping four straight months of gains that have underlined households’ continued resilience to high borrowing costs.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发贸易战担忧，日本股市下跌
item.description: 由于对全球贸易战的担忧引发了科技公司和汽车制造商等出口商的普遍抛售，日本股市下跌，拖累基准指数 Topix 下跌超过 2%。【原文：Japanese stocks fell, dragging the benchmark Topix down more than 2%, as fears of global trade war spurred widespread selling in exporters such as technology companies and automakers.】

item.title: 英国央行 "滞胀 "预测令里夫斯受挫
item.description: 就在英国财政大臣公布一揽子提振经济的重大措施几天后，英国央行预计将在本周下调经济增长前景，并警告其 10 月份的预算将推高通胀，从而给蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）造成打击。【原文：The Bank of England is expected to deal Rachel Reeves a blow this week by downgrading its growth outlook and warning that her October budget will drive up inflation just days after the Chancellor of the Exchequer unveiled a huge package of measures to boost the economy.】
